Phase 1

  • Ocean and Seas Collection AI genereted ocean NFTs, with profits donated towards ocean waste removal and the Eco Planet Impact Fund . EcoPlanet Token An eco-friendly form of paying, donating, or investing. Developed on the Solana blockchain with a percentage donated towards the environmental causes.
